desc: We strive to make our mark in the jewelry world by helping to bring it into the green age. We use ethically sourced, recycled, and upcycled materials to make the shopping experience a guilt free process. In an age of extreme wastefulness in the commerce sector, we will be the change we want to see.

layout.text:
Handmade Eclectic Jewelry and Decor
We create unique items for free spirits using genuine Crystals and Gemstones.
